pages.text: This is a $(l:programming/conditions)Condition/$ widget.$(p)The $(thing)Drone Condition: RF/$ widget allows you to check the amount of $(thing)Forge Energy (FE)/$ carried by this $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$.$(p)$(italic)Despite its name, this widget checks FE (including RF), not specifically RF (Redstone Flux) - the name is historical./$
